title: Favero Assioma Pro MX Review: The Obvious Choice for a Power Meter Pedal
content:
In this episode of Race Metal, Miguel tries power meter pedals for the first time: Favero Assioma’s Pro MX. He shares his experience and the things that he really likes about these pedals, and why they might be the only choice for power meter pedals in the market…
